meanings.definition: Relating to the basic physical and organizational structures and facilities needed for the operation of a society or enterprise.
meanings.sent1: The infrastructural development of the city included new roads and bridges.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in infrastructural improvements to enhance productivity.
meanings.sent3: The infrastructural changes in the office made finding the coffee machine an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Her leadership skills were the infrastructural support that held the team together.
meanings.sent5: The infrastructural changes were like a breath of fresh air, revitalizing the entire organization.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to the underlying framework or features of a system or organization.
meanings.sent1: The infrastructural elements of the software were crucial for its functionality.
meanings.sent2: Understanding the infrastructural components of the project was key to its success.
meanings.sent3: The infrastructural details of the plan were so intricate, they seemed like a puzzle.
meanings.sent4: His ideas formed the infrastructural backbone of the entire operation.
meanings.sent5: The infrastructural framework was like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
